name: Legend and Tenses
description:
Monsters have taken over Willow Creek School. As one of the best Monster Slayers, Principal Andersonwolf Fangthompson invited you to kill the monsters and their boss to restore peace to the school. Ms. Elesther Serajames will tutor you in her English lesson that will help you to acquire the skills to beat the monsters.

*Note: The game can be played on your browser with your phone or pc. If you are playing on your phone, use Two-finger Tap to access the menu screen.
